title: Gaborone
summary: Gaborone (UK: /ˌɡæbəˈroʊni, ˌhæb-/ GAB-ə-ROH-nee, HAB-,[11][12] US: /ˌɡɑːbəˈroʊni, -neɪ/ GAH-bə-ROH-nee, -⁠nay,[11][13] Tswana: [χabʊˈrʊnɛ]) is the capital and largest city of Botswana with a population of 231,626 based on the 2011 census,[6] about 10% of the total population of Botswana.[14] Its agglomeration is home to 421,907 inhabitants at the 2011 census.
